TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 實作標記延伸，該標記延伸支援從 XAML 進行的靜態 (XAML 載入時間 (Load Time)) 資源參考。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是標記延伸實作。This class is a markup extension implementation. 在 WPF 中的標記延伸類別存在主要是為了提供某種程度的基礎結構支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 處理器實作中，與標記延伸模組所公開的成員不通常稱為從使用者程式碼。Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此延伸模組支援[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)從 XAML 的使用方式。This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) usage from XAML. 如需有關 WPF XAML 中的靜態資源查閱的機制的詳細資訊，請參閱[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)或是[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) or [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `{StaticResource}` 是標記延伸的特定 XAML 的 WPF 實作。`{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML. 您可以使用`{StaticResource}`wpf，參考預設 XAML 命名空間，而不使用前置詞時。You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix. 相反地，針對 XAML 語言所定義的標記延伸支援 (例如`{x:Type}`) 需要使用中的 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間前置詞。In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標記延伸和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md). 靜態資源參考通常會用於 XAML 每當[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)不明確的需要。Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) is not explicitly necessary.

Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider

span.span: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 傳回物件，這個物件應該設定於套用這個延伸的屬性上。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 對於 ，這是在資源字典中找到的物件，其中要尋找的物件是以 識別。

span.span: For , this is the object found in a resource dictionary, where the object to find is identified by the .

returns.span: 要在屬性上設定的物件值，標記延伸提供的值會在這個屬性中進行評估。

span.span: The object value to set on the property where the markup extension provided value is evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 處理器實作中，而不是直接呼叫。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 處理器實作中使用此方法正確處理`StaticResource`物件建立期間的延伸模組值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation. 若要設定的屬性可以藉由識別（標準屬性） 或（相依性屬性）。The property to be set can be identified by a (standard property) or (dependency property). 此實作會依賴 XAML 相關的服務，根據傳入`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 它不得是`null`。It must not be `null`. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]實作中，以下是從服務內容所需的服務：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context: - - - 如果遺漏任何這些服務，標記延伸的使用方式會擲回例外狀況。If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.

exception.span: 為 ，或無法實作必要的服務。

span.span: was , or failed to implement a required service.

The resource key for a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量詳細資訊，請參閱 < [StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md).
